title: Research
intro: My research explores the intersection of computational neuroscience, cognitive psychology, and brain imaging to understand how we think, remember, and make decisions.

areas.title: Working Memory Dynamics
areas.description: Investigating how the brain temporarily stores and manipulates information using EEG and computational modeling.

areas.title: Attention Networks
areas.description: Studying how attention systems coordinate to filter information and guide behavior.

areas.title: Cognitive Aging
areas.description: Examining how cognitive functions change across the lifespan and identifying protective factors.
